S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3844: ASSERT failure in BasePage.unlatch() when running LobStreamsTest
Disallows calling getBlob or getClob more than once on a given LOB column (on the same result set row). See release note for details, this change may break existing applications.
Patch file: derby-3844-1c-disallow_multiple_accesses.diff
